RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Scale Mapper
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Allows for remapping of existing instrument keyzones to a scale as defined by the user or chosen from a preset. An optional Chord note can be added which is also scaled. Perfect for locking instruments to a scale or to completely change the tuning of XRNI's.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: fathand | fathand@gmail.com
